requirements.summary: Create a playable 2D game with interactive gameplay mechanics that responds to user input
acceptanceCriteria: Game has clear win/loss conditions or scoring system
User can interact with the game through keyboard or mouse controls
Game state updates in real-time based on user actions
Game can be started, played, and restarted

file_operations.description: Create main game page component that hosts the game canvas, controls game state (playing, paused, game over), handles game initialization and restart, and displays current score. Integrate generated game assets from frontend/public/assets/generated/game-background.dim_1920x1080.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/player-sprite.dim_128x128.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/game-element.dim_96x96.png as static assets.

Create game canvas component that renders the 2D game using HTML5 canvas or React-based rendering. Implement game loop with requestAnimationFrame for real-time updates. Handle keyboard/mouse input events for player controls. Implement collision detection, game physics, and win/loss conditions. Emit score updates to parent component.
Create game controls component with Start, Pause, and Restart buttons. Display current game state and provide clear visual feedback for user actions.

Create custom hook that manages game state (score, isPlaying, isGameOver), player position/velocity, game elements state, and game loop timing. Provide methods for starting, pausing, restarting game, and updating score based on game events.
Wire GamePage into the application router by adding a route for the game at path '/game' or '/' and update navigation to include the game page link.

requirements.summary: Design a distinctive visual theme with cohesive colors, typography, and layout that creates an engaging gaming atmosphere
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design uses a consistent color palette throughout the game interface
Typography choices enhance readability and match the game's theme
Layout provides clear visual hierarchy for game elements and UI controls
Overall aesthetic creates an immersive gaming experience

file_operations.description: Define game-specific CSS custom properties for consistent color palette (primary, secondary, accent colors for game UI, background gradients). Add typography rules with game-appropriate font families and sizes. Apply base styling for game atmosphere (dark/vibrant theme).
Extend Tailwind theme with custom colors matching the game's visual identity, custom font families for game UI, and spacing utilities for game layout consistency.
Create layout component that wraps game content with consistent header, game area, and score display regions. Apply visual hierarchy using the defined theme colors and typography.

requirements.summary: Implement score tracking and persistence so players can see their current score and high scores are saved between sessions
acceptanceCriteria: Current score is displayed during gameplay
High score is persisted in the backend and retrieved on game load
Score updates correctly based on game events
High score is updated when current score exceeds it

file_operations.description: Create score display component that shows current score during gameplay and high score from backend. Format scores with appropriate styling to match game theme.

Create custom hook using React Query to fetch high scores from backend via getHighScores() method and submit new scores via submitScore(score) method when game ends. Handle loading and error states. Cache high scores and invalidate cache after submission.

Integrate useHighScore hook to fetch and display high scores. When game ends, compare current score with high score and submit via backend if current score is higher. Update ScoreDisplay with both current and high scores.

requirements.summary: Render generated game assets including background images, character sprites, or game element graphics as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are properly referenced and displayed in the game interface
Image assets load correctly without backend routing

file_operations.description: Load and render generated game assets as static images. Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/game-background.dim_1920x1080.png for game background, frontend/public/assets/generated/player-sprite.dim_128x128.png for player character rendering, and frontend/public/assets/generated/game-element.dim_96x96.png for game obstacles or collectibles. Preload images before game starts to ensure smooth rendering.

Create asset manifest module that exports paths to generated game assets: frontend/public/assets/generated/game-background.dim_1920x1080.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/player-sprite.dim_128x128.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/game-element.dim_96x96.png. Provide helper functions for preloading images.
